title: #224: Profiling Detective Trapp
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa are joined by LA Times journalist Christoper Goffard to discuss his new hit podcast, Detective Trapp. 


#DetectiveTrapp

#VictimsMatter

#CoerciveControl

#SerialPerpetrator


To listen to Detective Trapp:

https://wondery.com/shows/detective-trapp/#
